message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.CV 

The paper deals with the problem of training multilayer feedforward SNNs, which is a topic related to neural networks and machine learning. Therefore, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses optimization methods and error backpropagation, which are topics related to machine learning and artificial intelligence, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) likely sub-categories as well. The paper also mentions event-triggered learning, which is a topic related to control systems, making cs.SY (Systems and Control) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the application of the learning rule to image classification, which is a topic related to computer vision, making cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) a possible sub-category.
